NPC_ans:
Can you give me some space? I need some breathing room
here.
I already told you everything I know. Leave me alone.
Are you stalking me? Seriously, back off.

I'm trying to concentrate here. Can you stop bothering
me?
You're like a mosquito buzzing in my ear. Go away!
What do you want from me? I've got nothing else to say.

I'm not your personal information booth. Leave me
alone.

Do you have a problem with personal boundaries? Stop
crowding me.
I'm getting really sick of your constant interruptions.
Can't you see I'm busy? I don't have time for this.
I'm not in the mood for small talk. Move along.
You're like a broken record. Stop repeating yourself.

I don't have anything to say to you right now. Please
leave.
You're really starting to get on my nerves. Back off.

Do you enjoy annoying people? Because that's what
you're doing right now.
If you don't leave me alone, you're going to regret it.

Keep it up and I'll make sure you never find what
you're looking for.

One more word from you and I'll make sure you never
leave this place alive.
You don't want to push me too far. Trust me on that.

I'm not someone you want to mess with. Back off before
things get ugly.

I have connections. Connections that can make your life
a living hell. Do yourself a favor and leave me alone.

I know people. People who can make your worst
nightmares come true. You really want to keep pushing
me?

I've dealt with people like you before. People who
think they can get what they want just by being
annoying. Let me tell you, it never ends well.

You're starting to cross a line here. I suggest you
back off before things get out of hand.

I have a short fuse and you're getting dangerously
close to the end of it. Do yourself a favor and walk
away.
